name: Eni (Demo)
description:
• Extensive amounts of dialogue and interactions
  • Tasks to perform and alternate outcomes to certain situations
  • Generous amounts of recreation
Controls To Keep In Mind:
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • Esc - Open/Close Menu
  • Enter or Spacebar - Select/Interact with entities, environment, etc.
